Package peregrine.io.storage

Metadata about files created on the local filesystem for usage by the controller to look for data imbalances with shuffle, data, balance data base on disk usages, and to help sysadmins and developers understand file system distribution within the cluster.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ChunkMeta MetaData about a chunk within an individual file.
FileMeta Metadata about a chunked file.
GlobalFileIndex Represents the computed storage metadata from GlobalFileLookup.
GlobalFileLookup  
HostPartitionKey Unique key for a given Host and Partition for usage with Map.
LocalFileIndex Index of all files on a worker.
LocalFileIndexBuilder  
LocalFileReference Maps between FileMeta and ChunkMeta for a file on the local worker.
 

Package peregrine.io.storage Description

Metadata about files created on the local filesystem for usage by the controller to look for data imbalances with shuffle, data, balance data base on disk usages, and to help sysadmins and developers understand file system distribution within the cluster.
